isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 18 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14618 AND RTLO-16618 SERIES - INSTALL - SLAVE VALVE

step1.para: If previously removed, install the air line fittings on the slave valve ( Figure 295).

figure.caption: Figure 295. Install Air Line Fittings on Slave Valve

step1.para: Install the spring on the shank of the actuating pin and insert in the bore of the transmission case ( Figure 296).

figure.caption: Figure 296. Install Spring on Shank of Actuating Pin and Insert in Transmission Case Bore

step1.para: Install the hat-type alignment sleeve in the bore of the slave valve ( Figure 297).

figure.caption: Figure 297. Install Hat-Type Alignment Sleeve in Bore of Slave Valve

step1.para: Position gasket on the valve mounting surface (inset, Figure 298) and install the slave valve on the case, inserting the end of the actuating pin into the alignment sleeve ( Figure 298). Secure the valve to the case with four bolts. Apply Loctite 242 or equivalent to bolt threads. Tighten evenly to 8 to 12 ft-lbs. (11 to 16 N·m).

figure.caption: Figure 298. Position Gasket on Valve Mounting Surface and Install Slave Valve on Case
